all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
And if thou art faithful unto the end thou shalt have a crown of immortality, and eternal life in the mansions which I have prepared in the house of my Father.
Doctrine and Covenants 81:6
Quote of the Day
"Draw near [Christ] by always remembering Him. Seek Him diligently through scripture study."
President Henry B. Eyring | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
